QuestData.Title: Four Twilight Elements
QuestData.Description: The Twilight's Hammer have summoned a monstrosity. It's a combination of the four elements infused with the power of their special ore, Elementium.$B$BIf you want to save your precious Thousand Needles from total destruction, you're going to have to destroy it. But first, you'll need a few things to get through its protective shielding.$B$BGo east into the Withering and bring back the four Twilight elements.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the four Twilight Elements: Air, Earth, Fire, and Water.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have all of the elements, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: <Magatha gazes at you with naked disdain.>$B$BI'll combine them into a suitable form. I'll keep its use simple.
